snippet: The Carnegie Club Cocktail and Smoking Lounge is one of the rare public places where you can legally smoke a cigar in 21st-century Manhattan.
abstract: Neighborhood Joint column on the Carnegie Club Cocktail and Smoking Lounge in Midtown Manhattan, where patrons can legally smoke from a choice of about 40 cigars listed on the menu.
lead_paragraph: The Carnegie Club Cocktail and Smoking Lounge is one of the rare public places where you can legally smoke a cigar in 21st-century Manhattan.

headline.print_headline: Through the Haze, It Sounds Like Sinatra
headline.main: Through the Haze at the Carnegie Club, It Sounds Like Sinatra
